video_title: CvH (Polygon)-The harsh reality of being a CISO
description: High-stakes and high-pressure, legal risks, misaligned incentives, and relentless threats from hackers and nation-states. I’ll break down the harsh realities, the personal and professional risks, and why, despite it all, it’s still worth it
